spiritsExplanation:
The "Walk the Plank Row" workout is an outdoor rowing session on the Charles River, evident from both the description and the image. The mention of rowing on a river indicates a strong "Outdoor & Adventure" spirit, with the Halloween theme adding an element of fun and exploration, hence a high score of 0.9.

The workout description highlights "Drive harrrrrd through your legs" and a rhythm setting of 30 max, along with pop and global hits music, suggesting a smooth and rhythmic flow, hence aligning with the "Flow & Rhythm" spirit with a score of 0.65. The playlist with catchy and engaging songs further emphasizes this spirit.

While the workout type "sweat" and "interval" format suggest moderate intensity, with a 2 out of 3 level, it does not reach the level required to be classified under "High-Energy & Intense." Thus, this spirit is excluded from classification. The structured nature of intervals suggests some discipline, but the playful theme and outdoor activity reduce emphasis on "Structured & Disciplined," leading to its exclusion.
